body:
Hurrah!!!!! there was a mix up on Quollcraft, somebody made an account with my username and stole an avicus map, it got me banned....i cri........but thanks to the avicus staff's understanding they unbanned me, so you will be seeing me again on avicus (yay!!!!)........i never did an AMA so i thought this would be a good time......... 
Let us begin...

title: Mark's AMA (Ive been Unbanned!!!!)
